trans-unit.source: Describes a delegated transaction for an existing transaction that can be escalated to be managed by the MSDTC when needed.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver en delegerad transaktion för en befintlig transaktion kan eskaleras hanterad av MSDTC vid behov.

trans-unit.source: When you want to implement a resource manager, you should not implement the ITransactionPromoter interface directly.
trans-unit.target: När du vill implementera en resurshanterare bör du inte implementerar gränssnittet ITransactionPromoter direkt.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should implement <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification> inteface which inherits the single <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> method of this interface.
trans-unit.target: I stället kan du implementera <xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>gränssnitt som ärver enda <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A>-metoden i det här gränssnittet.</xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: For more information on implementing a resource manager, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du implementerar en resurshanterare finns [implementera en Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e).

trans-unit.source: Notifies an enlisted object that an escalation of the delegated transaction has been requested.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar en registrerade objekt eskalering av delegerad transaktionen har begärts.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException> should be thrown by an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> interface to indicate that a call to Promote has failed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException>bör utlöstes av en implementering av <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>-gränssnittet för att indikera att ett anrop till befordra misslyckades.</xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException>

trans-unit.source: A transmitter/receiver propagation token that marshals a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: En Spridningstoken för transmitter/mottagare som marshals en distribuerad transaktion.
